alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:12AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen, northeastern Adams, southern Paulding and Van Wert Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 512 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Decatur, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monroeville around 520 AM EDT. Convoy around 525 AM EDT. Van Wert around 530 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
